include/jevois/Core/Engine.H File Reference include/jevois/Core/Engine.H #include <jevois/Core/VideoMapping.H> #include <jevois/Component/Manager.H> #include <jevois/Types/Enum.H> #include <jevois/Image/RawImage.H> #include <jevois/Core/CameraCalibration.H> #include <jevois/Debug/Watchdog.H> #include <memory> #include <mutex> #include <vector> #include <list> #include <atomic> Include dependency graph for Engine.H:
This graph shows which files directly or indirectly include this file:
Classes
class jevois::Engine
JeVois processing engine - 从相机传感器获取图像，对其进行处理，并通过 USB 发送结果。
Namespaces
jevois
所有 JeVois 类和函数的主命名空间
Macros
#define JEVOIS_CAMERA_DEFAULT "/dev/video0"
在平台硬件上，相机传感器设备
#define JEVOIS_GADGET_DEFAULT ""
在平台硬件上，USB gadget 驱动程序的设备（通过 USB 将视频帧发送到主机）
#define JEVOIS_SERIAL_DEFAULT "/dev/ttyS4"
在平台硬件上，4 针硬件串口设备
#define JEVOIS_USBSERIAL_DEFAULT ""
在平台硬件上，用于串行 USB 端口的设备
#define JEVOIS_CAMERASENS_DEFAULT CameraSensor::any
默认相机传感器
#define JEVOIS_IMUSPI_DEFAULT "/dev/spidev32766.0"
默认 IMU spi 设备
